name: eu-motorcycle-shop-login
description: Motorcycle shop login application with React

scripts.build:css: npx sass src/styles/login.scss public/css/login.css && npx sass src/styles/homepage.scss public/css/homepage.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.start: npm run build && npx http-server public -p 8080
